PATRICK CRADDOCK, CLERK
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
ALEXANDER CITY DIVISION
CHRISTOPHER BLAINE MCGREGOR )
PLAINTIFF/RESPONDENT )
)
VS. ) CASE NO. DR-2023-900051.01
)
BRITTANY MICHELLE GILLILAND )
DEFENDANT/PETITIONER )
MOTION TO ALLOW SUBMISSION OF PLAINTIFF’S AFFIDAVIT
REGARDING CHILD SUPPORT IN LIEU OF TESTIMONY
Cones now the Plaintiff/Father, Christopher Blaine McGregor, by and through his
attorney of record and moves this Honorable Court to allow the submission of an affidavit
regarding child support in this matter. As grounds for said motion, Plaintiff/Father would show
the Court the following:
1) That a hearing was held in this matter on the 11th day of June, 2025.
2) That the Father and his counsel appeared at said hearing. However, the
Defendant/Mother was unable to appear due to being hospitalized in preparation
for childbirth. The Mother’s counsel appeared on her behalf.
3) That counsel for both parties presented arguments and information relevant to the
issues before the Court, including child support.
4) That the Father requests leave to submit a sworn affidavit addressing relevant
facts in support of his position as presented by counsel at the hearing.
WHEREFORE, the premises considered, Plaintiff/Father respectfully requests that this
Honorable Court allow the submission of his sworn affidavit and consider it as part of the record
in this matter.
Respectfully submitted this the 12th day of June, 2025.
1
DOCUMENT 192
/s/Dianne James Davis
Dianne James Davis (DAV007)
